name: rastaban
text: Astute readers will note that Ray's house now features a new wing and a few new gables. Dude loves to tinker.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: More gables, fewer hips.

name: radioelectric
text: Why does it remind me of Civ III?

name: panthera3000
text: I thought EXACTLY the same but with Civ I. I used to play that a LOT and would always build weird castles with pieces that didnt match

name: rmj12345
text: When has Ray's house been shown before?

name: dppolk
text: I saw Ray's house here

name: hollybones
text: I recall a top-down shot when he was complaining about his neighbors selling car parts on their lawns.

name: hollybones
text: http://achewood.com/index.php?date=06262006

name: rothenbergxxx
text: Ah, and indeed there is a wing missing from the right side.

name: djwhiterabbit
text: i think they were pissing into empties.

name: kreftron
text: Diggin' any strip that gives a better idea of the layout and enormity of the Smuckles residence.

name: brentbrentbrent
text: Is that a HINT??

name: invidious
text: Is it just me, or is the state of Minnesota visiting Ray? (2nd floor, 2nd window from the right)

name: lizjones
text: The pro-life crowd is always punctual.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: In this case, premature. Ah-huh-huh.

name: deus
text: It took you a year to come up with that joke.

name: odvo
text: A comment left by odvo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by caduceo, rachel, Teldin)

name: epicurus
text: Ray really should have known that this project was gonna run to conundrums when he was reviewing the blueprints.

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, Sakana, equinn2006, Sargasm)

name: omnidope
text: There must be an toy-fetus factory somewhere. Barbie visits often.

name: princelumber
text:
yeah, i can't recall any strip where the entire house was shown in one frame.
you'd think he woulda parked Airwolf in the yard.....

name: jenh
text: But parking in the yard is Tacky.

name: neonfreon
text: A comment left by neonfreon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, Zefiel, Overmedicated, fosters, equinn2006, Sargasm, Mastronaut)

name: twohundredninety
text:
Hrm. The smoke, the gate in the wall on the left, the window on the right -- and the door handle, obviously.

That's four, and I feel stupid. I'm assuming subtle differences in bushes and things don't count.

name: neonfreon
text: I was counting differences in bushes too, actually.  I didn't even really count, i just noticed there were differences and thought I'd throw that out there.  Thanks for playing, you're a winner!

name: reverendsam
text: A comment left by reverendsam was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by madnes, riotdejaneiro, BionicVapourBoy, fosters, omnidope, mortshire, Sargasm, HappyCat, Teldin, stormagnet, czarcastic)

name: zaratustra
text: man how do you even identify such a quality in a drawing

name: shmuckeles
text: well, it IS kinda surreal to look at, but i wouldn't be the one to make that judgement

name: trollcollins
text: I am delighted at the notion of a mannequin Sandra Bullock putting her head in an oven Sylvia Plath style.

name: primal_in_the_mane
text: all whale tale rudely poking out as she bends over to end her life

name: evolume
text: i bet the cartoon mannequin of Sandra Bullock can act circles around the real Sandra Bullock

name: daniel
text: No doubt.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: "pointy white chick" is my favorite part of this strip.

name: cchauffe
text: I hope the ad Ray is referencing was on Craig's List.

name: stevesperd
text: Who is it in the west wing window, 2nd floor, 2nd from the right?

name: ntopp
text: My guess would be Charlie "Little Nephew" Smuckles.

name: slanger
text: T-T-Todd T squirell?  Even though he's a crappy little bullshit dude?  Dunno, it's all clandestine. I wondered that too.

name: totoro23
text: that's Ray's house? cuz damn thats one classy pad

name: czarcastic
text:
"could be any pointy white chick"
Beautiful.

name: hoboninja
text: What's that in the second-from-right top window?

name: princelumber
text:
a. the trees look like joints.
b. i think that's todd in the window.

name: never_die
text: ray clearly had the gardners trim the trees in that manner.

name: herbincommando
text: ray's yard krew hasnt shown up for the past 2 months, yo

text: A comment left by retardo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pjalne, straw, Norsef, ppccd, equinn2006, woodenteeth, howl, atticusonline, Setzkin, Boredom_Man, I_Love_Kate)

name: i_love_kate
text:
Leave the good doctor alone! He is not like you!

I don't think.

name: tekende
text:
It's modified lyrics to the Crystals song "Da Doo Ron Ron".

I only know this because I am a big fan of Phil Spector.

name: kazad
text: damn there is no way i can find that comment both chubby and lame...

name: andrew_
text: I find it comical that there would exist a place which sells both a Sandra Bullock doll and a Sylvia Plath doll, in that sort of position, no less.

name: twotonturkey
text: I was thinking that myself.  It seems that a company like that is in danger of spreading itself too thin.

name: stevepants
text: Gotta love any appearance by humans

name: lucho
text: A comment left by lucho was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by madnes, RogerGS, mortshire, farqussus)

name: dj
text: Just a guess here but I think one protestor is addressing another protestor named Randy?

name: morganization
text: high score for the drawing of a tiny fetus doll. it's kind of cute

name: rogergs
text: Those dolls are obviously refurbished overstock from the Korovo Milkbar.

name: rogergs
text: I mean the female celebrity dolls, not the tiny fetus dolls, although I dimly remember seeing one of those used as a swizzle stick in a Moloko Fizz.

name: evolume
text: dunno... instead of anti-abortion protesters, a more tacky display may have been the protesters from the Westboro Baptist Church.

name: foea
text: They are in fact the worst thing to see. They drag their lumpy inbred children to local functions. It's always special to see a pasty 7-year-old holding a large sign depicting stick figures engaged in anal sex.

name: jopon
text:
Loving the Sylvia Plath humor.

Hatin' Sylvia Plath.

name: duskbringer
text: If you turn your screen 90° to the left, you can totally see Alfred Hitchcock hiding behind the trees on the right. I know this because I was trying to look down Sandra Bullock's top.

name: le_chien_manquee
text: A comment left by le_chien_manquee was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by jdhenry105, RogerGS, mortshire, moe_hawkins, poot)

name: lamer
text: a chubby is like a semi - a semi erect penis, that is.

name: le_chien_manquee
text: i'm not sure i like the idea of calling my dick chubby.  not that it is, right now.  i'm at work for christ's sake

name: lateadopter
text: I'd rather have it called chubby than pee-wee.

name: supernintendochalmers
text: ray's house was on cribs too i think

name: qingofchina
text: Played :(

name: antsama
text: I love it when Onstad shows off the fact that he's actually an incredible artist that can draw more than cats and otters.  Today's first panel is just awesome.

name: jimmykey
text: Abortion rocks.

name: sherief
text: There's a blasphemous part of me that thinks that this whole thing may have started when Onstad realized he couldn't draw Slyvia Plath...Or that we wouldn't recognize her from any other pointy white chick

name: evilrobot
text:
He'd would have been absolutely right on the later part. I have absolutely no recollection of what Sylvia Plath looks like, and by him not drawing her visage in to the strip he saved me at least one trip to Wikipedia to find out how close he came to capturing her likeness.

Then you had to show up and post this and now I have to go to Wikipedia. Thanks. Jerk.

name: sherief
text: I know it's a bit late, but I have to tell you I changed the wikipedia picture to maintain the pointy white chick enigma.

name: envika
text: What's poking out of that window way on the right?

name: zefiel
text: Now Mexican highways include ads with pictures of lots of broken human fetuses. No Joke.

name: dasilodavi
text: Now's as good a time as any to bring it up.  Where the hell did all these commenters come from?  I didn't see like 3/5ths of you in the archives, you just popping in to the new stuff and treating this joint like a forum?  All that shit about steak a strip back made me want to blow my face off.

name: wharfrat
text: pointy white chick?

name: bizarro8mybaby
text: I'm pretty sure that Ray's impressions about Sylvia Plath's underwear choices are stored somewhere adjacent to the molecule of his brain that contains Canadian history.

name: norsef
text:
It's the anti-abortion people. I knew they'd be early.

I'm not sure why but that makes me laugh every time.
